ygData.msgSnippet: Sscratch the part about putting CyberShark into the CR.  He came out already. ... She smirked at HotRod.  How does it feel to be on my side for once? ...

Sscratch the part about putting CyberShark into the CR.  He came out 
already.  

::Feline::

She smirked at HotRod.  "How does it feel to be on my side for once?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Feline::
> 
> She felt his hands grip her arms and his metal lips press 
forcefully 
> against her own.  She sighed and knew he still wanted her.  That 
gave 
> her the advantage.  She pulled back and looked at him. "I'm happy 
to 
> know that your alright handsome.  But I do need you to put this bot 
> (CyberShark) into the CR.  He will come ing useful to you later on."
> She smiled evily at HotRod.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Hot Rod::
> > 
> > He saw the other bot.
> > "Looks like you dont need any help, love." His usually bright blue
> > optics were a hellish red. 
> > "I'm feeling just fine. I'm finally seeing things clearly." He 
> walked up
> > to her, and kissed her, more aggresivly then normal.
